original_title: Big Wave: Blood, Sweat, and Fear
overview: Chasing giant swells is every surfers dream, but that dream can sometimes swiftly turn into a nightmare. Starring Benjamin Sanchis and Shane Dorian, this film gives you an underground look into the pain and passion that goes into big wave conquest. This is the full story of what it takes to ride and capture the heaviest waves on the planet.
title: Big Wave: Blood, Sweat, and Fear
